Posts.Content:
i had my left breast biopsied yesterday,its a 5 mm mass really small bout a pea size and the surgeon said he thinks he got it all, it didnt hurt at all just a little uncomfortable..he showed me< which i really didn't wanna see> what he took out,it was gross, kinda looks like a raw meat, yuk,but he showed me one part he was concerned about
 and it had a dark little tiny black spot in it,i am so scared and praying its not cancer, i am going through menopause as i had a hysto last year<not cancer related though>and they took everything, now i am afraid there gonna have to take my breast!!please say a prayer i get the results tomorrow at 2.00 i have to be in his office to get them he says he makes all his patience go to his office..oh and he did tell my husband theres a good chance its benign but i think he was just trying to make him calm.
Posts.Title: sooo scared!!
